attributes.action: Condemn the action of the prophet Mohammed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
We do not accept petitions that call upon the PM to adopt a particular petitioner's points of view - petitions should request specific changes, for example, to policy and legislation.
Your petition also contains claims that we have been unable to substantiate.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
